executable.title: Enhance Tubes Using Discriminant Analysis (TubeTK)
executable.description: Given an image and foreground and background masks, computes multiscale Jet (0, 1, and 2 order) features at each pixel, performs a multivariate LDA or PCA for separating the classes, and generates the LDA/PCA instances of the images.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

image.name: labelmap
image.label: Label Map
image.description: Label map that designates the object of interest and "other."

integer-vector.name: objectIdList
integer-vector.label: Object ID
integer-vector.description: List of values that represent the objects in the label map.

parameters.label: Basis Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters that determine how the basis is generated.

double-vector.name: tubeScales
double-vector.description: Scales at which tube features are computed.
double-vector.label: Tube scales

string.name: saveDiscriminantInfo
string.description: Save learned info to a file.
string.label: Save learned info to file

string.name: loadDiscriminantInfo
string.description: Load learned discriminant info from a file.
string.label: Load learned discriminant info from file
